title: Length of Last Word
description:
Given a string s consisting of words and spaces, return the length of the last word in the string.

A word is a maximal substring consisting of non-space characters only.
constraints: s consists of only English letters and spaces ' '.
There will be at least one word in s.

examples.explanation: The last word is "World" with length 5.

examples.input: s = "   fly me   to   the moon  "
examples.explanation: The last word is "moon" with length 4.
The last word is "joyboy" with length 6.

starterCode.python:
class Solution:
    def lengthOfLastWord(self, s: str) -> int:

driverCode.python:
import sys

if __name__ == '__main__':
    s = sys.stdin.read().rstrip('\n')
    sol = Solution()
    print(sol.lengthOfLastWord(s))
